Name: Ahmad Hajjar
AboutMe:
My name is Ahmad Hajjar, I have been developing software for a while now, and until now I still feel like a child when I experience a new awesome technology, and every time I solve a challenge I feel like I've got a new baby (even I don't have children :D ) programming for me is a passion. I am always eager to learn new stuff and to contribute in new projects.

Throughout my work, I have had the opportunity to hone my skills, in programming languages most importantly Java and PHP, Web technologies (HTML, CSS, JS, ...), Linux, and more tools and technologies, and there was a lot of time to practice my favourite hobby (Debugging and troubleshooting :D ).

If you want to contact me ash852006@gmail.com
